tool_description: Looks up a word in a dictionary and returns all collocations
name: Linguatools English Collocations
title: Linguatools English Collocations

api_list.name: collocations v2 ( + pos)
api_list.description:
looks up collocations
new version in 2022: considers the part of speech of the query; some relation names changed

optional_parameters.name: relation
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following relations (case sensitive): 
V:obj:N 
V:prep:N 
V:obj1+2:N 
V:obj+prep:N 
V:subj:N 
V:sc:Vinf (~~V:sc:V~~)
N:mod:Adj (~~N:mod:A~~)
N:prep:N 
N:nn:N 
V:mod:Adv (~~V:mod:A~~ )
Adj:mod:Adv (~~A:mod:A~~)

optional_parameters.name: min_sig
optional_parameters.description: any number as the minimum significance (optional). Will return only collocations with significance >= min_sig

optional_parameters.name: pos
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following Part Of Speech (case sensitive): 
V
Vinf
N
Adj
Adv

api_list.name: collocations

optional_parameters.name: relation
optional_parameters.description: One of the following relations (case sensitive, optional): V:obj:N V:prep:N V:obj1+2:N V:obj+prep:N V:subj:N V:sc:V N:mod:A N:prep:N N:nn:N V:mod:A A:mod:A

optional_parameters.name: min_sig
optional_parameters.description: any number as the minimum significance (optional). Will return only collocations with significance >= min_sig
